revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #66 Starf |image = [[File:Starf.png]] |caption = This Berry is considered a mirage. It was said to be so strong that it had to be abandoned at the world's edge. |growtime = 1d |harvest = 0.5 berries |replant = 0% |points = 15,000 |flavor =
*30 spicy *10 dry *30 sweet *10 bitter *30 sour }} '''Starf''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by having at least 1 empty plot while encountering a shiny wandering pokemon. The [[Salac]] or any later berry must be unlocked to unlock this berry. It emits an aura that increases the [[Shiny Chance]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 3 hours || 6 hours || 12 hours || 1 day - 5 days |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:StarfTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:StarfTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:StarfTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Aura (shiny chance) | ||
x1.005 ||
x1.01 ||
x1.015 |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[Farm]] in the following way to obtain this berry. Note that the setup omits a 24th [[Roseli]] as that would allow the mutation of the [[Custap]] which would occupy the empty plot. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[Roseli]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Roseli]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Roseli]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Roseli]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Roseli]] |- style="height: 26px;" | [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] |- style="height: 26px;" | [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] |- | [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] |- | [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] || || |}

{{Infobox Berry |name = #66 Starf |image = [[File:Starf.png]] |caption = This Berry is considered a mirage. It was said to be so strong that it had to be abandoned at the world's edge. |growtime = 1d |harvest = 0.5 berries |replant = 0% |points = 15,000 |flavor =
*30 spicy *10 dry *30 sweet *10 bitter *30 sour }} '''Starf''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by having at least 1 empty plot while encountering a shiny wandering pokemon. The [[Salac]] or any later berry must be unlocked to unlock this berry. It emits an aura that increases the [[Shiny Chance]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Note that the setup omits a 24th [[Roseli]] as that would allow the mutation of the [[Custap]] which would occupy the empty plot. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[Roseli]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Roseli]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Roseli]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Roseli]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Roseli]] |- style="height: 26px;" | [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] |- style="height: 26px;" | [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] |- | [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] |- | [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] || [[Roseli]] || || |}
